dict.acceptation: 叫回，召回；使想起，回想；取消；调回工厂；
召回，唤回；记忆力，回想；罢免；收回通告；

sent.orig: Recall that you can recall several taking a look at when one was young?
sent.trans: 回忆小时候看看你能记起几个？

sent.orig: Retailers and importers have been instructed to recall these products and withhold them from sale.
sent.trans: 零售商和进口商已经指示召回这些产品，并扣留他们出售。

sent.orig: Remember this, and be assured; Recall it to mind, you transgressors.
sent.trans: 赛46:8你们当想念这事、己作大丈夫．逆的人哪、心里思想。

sent.orig: A: Can you recall the games?
sent.trans: 你还能忆起这些比赛吗？

sent.orig: I can't recall any of us having a close enough friend to confide in.
sent.trans: 我记不起我们谁曾有过可以透露秘密的密友。
